job.title: Data Science Analyst
job.description: ltpgtWe are a digitally native company where innovation design and engineering meet scale We use the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspectltpgtltpgtWe want you to join us to work for the biggest clients in tech retail travel banking ecommerce and media revolutionizing and growing their core businesses while helping them and you stay ahead of the curve Be part of a company with the most cuttingedge practices and technologies plus a unique teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a Sr ltstronggtData Science Analyst ltstronggtfor a ltstronggtfull timeltstronggt position Ideally in Pacific or Central time zoneltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtJob DescriptionltpgtltpgtWe are seeking an experienced Sr Data Science Analyst to support the Adobe Spark and CC Education teams This role is a strategic role partnering with product managers and the leadership team making key decisions about the direction of our products Were looking for someone who has experience and passion about behavioral analysis for software productsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat youll doltpgtltpgtDeliver user insights and analysisltpgtltpgtUse SQL to analyze data and create a deeper understanding of our users and their behaviorsltpgtltpgtIdentify opportunities and advocate for product improvement and optimizationltpgtltpgtBuild dashboards and tools that provide insight around key metricsltpgtltpgtPresent findings to key leadership to influence product roadmapsltpgtltpgtPerform ad hoc analysis and data modeling to understand and predict behavior trends in order to optimize growth and engagementltpgtltpgtHelp our business make the right decisionsltpgtltpgtPartner closely with teams to understand their business objectives and provide datadriven solutions and recommendationsltpgtltpgtDefine the key business metrics to track the health of our business and drive better decision makingltpgtltpgtEmphasize the value of dataanalytics and help drive a datainformed cultureltpgtltpgtDrive our data platformltpgtltpgtPartner directly with the product development teams on product instrumentation product flow and data captureltpgtltpgtHelp drive the strategy and roadmap for dataanalytics tools and systemsltpgtltpgtBecome the subject matter expert on our data platform including driving the requirements for our internal event logging systems data processing engines experimentation frameworks and data visualizationdashboard toolsltpgtltpgtBuild trust in data by creating processes and frameworks that ensure data integrity and consistent data definitionsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat you need to succeedltpgtltpgtExtensive experience with SQLltpgtltpgtExperience with data visualization tools such as Tableau PowerBIltpgtltpgtProduct Sense Experience with software product behavior and funnel dataltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are interested in hardworking fastlearning talents and we have the knowhow and scale to help you make your own career path If you seek an entrepreneurial flexible and teamoriented culture come join usltpgtltpgtWe are readyltpgt
